title: Environmental Station Alpha
notes: Joypad must be set to "D-Pad only" for it to work properly without unintentional directional input, but D-pad doesn't work with it set up this way (DualShock 3)

title: Environmental Station Alpha
notes: It works, although Full-screen just maximizes the window, stretching the content horizontally

Full screen only produces maximized window. If not activated, the mouse clicks in menus are registered in the wrong spots, though. Also, activating gamepad results in constant "up" movement (XBOX 360 pad). In maximized window with only keyboard active seems to work ok.
title: Environmental Station Alpha
